mainText:
For years now I have followed the broadcasts of Apple Keynotes that 
always featured Steve in his familiar, trademark dress. Watching him, he 
acted like no other CEO I've ever seen. He was always laid back, casual, 
and spoke on a personal level to his audience. Watching the Keynote felt 
like inviting Steve into my own living room, and having him talk to me 
like a friend. Keynotes will never be the same without him, and neither 
will the world. May he rest in peace.
author: Les
